Katya: So I assume there is a use to this energon if you do not 
consider destroying it, quiaff?

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> Owlhawk:  As I already said we aquire these Beast
> Modes based on the DNA of local animals to conteract
> the radiation.  Also through experiences with an alien
> race called the Vok, some bots like myself have become
> transmetal.  Transmetals can be damaged by energon
> radiation, but have a much higher tolerance for it. 
> Here however the energon radiation seems to fluctuate
> from nearly zero, to off the scale.  So much even a
> transmetal can be damaged by it outside of Beast Mode.
> 
> --- Azure The Warrior <wingedwarrior41@h...>
> wrote:
> > Katya refrained to protest about the fact that her
> > mech was by far better 
> > then those made on Terra. It was irrelevant and she
> > knew it. What bothered 
> > her was the efficiency of Owlhawk considering these
> > radiations.
> > 
> > Katya: Is there a mean to counteract the radiations?
> > 
> > 
> > >From: Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@y...>
> > >Reply-To: nbwrpg@y...
> > >To: nbwrpg@y...
> > >Subject: Re: Winged Warrior
> > >Date: Tue, 10 Sep 2002 09:15:25 -0700 (PDT)
> > >
> > >OOC: I'm making this up as I go along, sorry if it
> > >goes against anything that's already been stated.
> > >
> > >BIC:  Owlhawk:  It's that glowing stone I showed
> > you
> > >back at the base.  It's the reason we aquired Beast
> > >Modes.  We use it for power, but to much of it can
> > >cause damage in robot mode.  Earth is rich in it,
> > and
> > >has enormous amounts of radiation.  My guess is
> > that
> > >you're not affected by it because you're an
> > organic,
> > >and your suit is not affected by it, because it was
> > >first developed here on Earth.
> > >
> > >--- Nic <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > > > OOC: They were at the ruins of the sphere,
> > right?
> > > >
> > > > Bic:
> > > >
> > > > Katya: Then why am I not affected? And what is
> > this
> > > > energon you talk
> > > > about?
> > > >
> > > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., Kyle Stewart
> > <dewboy30816@y...>
> > > > wrote:
> > > > > Owlhawk:  I.....think I'm fine......the
> > energon
> > > > level
> > > > > jumped off the scale for a second.....energon
> > > > > radiation is supposed to have minimal effects
> > on
> > > > > transmetals, so I don't know what could cause
> > it
> > > > to
> > > > > intesify so quickly, and so unpredictably.
> > > > >
> > > > > OOC: Something to that effect.
> > > > >
> > > > > --- warriorazure <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > > > > > I don't remember, can you send it again or
> > tell
> > > > me
> > > > > > what number it was?
> > > > > >
